params._maxChainlinkHeartbeat: max interval between within which chainlink oracle data is updated*

params.token1: one of the token for which price feed is to be checked
params.token2: other token for which price feed is to be checked

returns._0: if price feed exists for the token pair*

params.den: the address of the token in which price is queried
params.num: the address of the token for which price in queried

returns._0: price of the num in terms of den
returns._1: no of decimals for the price*

params.den: the address of the token in which price is queried
params.num: the address of the token for which price in queried

returns._0: price of the num in terms of den
returns._1: no of decimals for the price*

params.den: the address of the token in which price is queried
params.num: the address of the token for which price in queried

returns._0: price of the num in terms of wei for num and denom tokens
returns._1: no of decimals for the price*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._heartbeat: the time delta after which the price from the feed is discarded*
params._priceFeed: address of the price feed for the token
params._token: address of token for which price feed is added

params.pool: addrewss of the price feed for the token pair*
params.token1: address of one of the tokens for which price feed is added
params.token2: address of other token for which price feed is added

setUniswapPriceAveragingPeriod(uint32).details: only owner can set. This is used to prevent attacks to control price feed

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

chainlinkFeedAddresses(address).notice: stores the price oracle and its decimals for chainlink feeds*

constructor.notice: Used to initialize param during deployment

doesFeedExist(address,address).notice: used to check if price feed exists between 2 tokens

getChainlinkLatestPrice(address,address).notice: Used to get price of the num vs den token from chainlink

getLatestPrice(address,address).notice: Used to get price of the num vs den token

getUniswapLatestPrice(address,address).notice: Used to get price of the num vs den token from uniswap

initialize(address,uint32).notice: Used to initialize the price oracle contract

setChainlinkFeedAddress(address,address,.notice: Used to set the price feed address for a token in chainlink

setUniswapFeedAddress(address,address,ad.notice: Used to set the price feed address for a token pair in uniswap

setUniswapPriceAveragingPeriod(uint32).notice: Used to set the period in which uniswap price is averaged

uniswapPools(bytes32).notice: stores the addresses of price feeds for uniswap token pairs*

documentation.text: @notice stores the price oracle and its decimals for chainlink feeds*
@notice stores the addresses of price feeds for uniswap token pairs*
